title: i keep getting put into leaver buster because of the disconnect issue
body:
this is my 4th time in leaver buster. 
there is warning to try a reconnect as fast as you can
but the team surrenders everytime
is riot honestly not gonna give a crap?

replies.body:
Same man. And really I could care less about this bug, but its putting me in low priority cause of a bug i cant control.
like wtf

If you're referring to the Issue in the client ticker and on the [service status page](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#oce), this only affects the first attempt at connecting. If you're continually unable to connect to the match, it means your issue is unrelated and likely caused by an overall *poor connection* to the servers. I'd recommend working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to address the most common solutions for this.

Please let me know if those steps resolved the issue.
That's false. If you click retry and not cancel, it will continue to fail. I'd appreciate it if you guys didn't push these lies to players that are obviously tilted from this server-side issue.
